original_title: Richard II - Live at Shakespeare's Globe
overview: Ruling by divine right, but himself ruled by caprice, King Richard exiles Henry Bolingbroke and seizes his fatherâ€™s vast estates. While Richard is distracted by a rebellion in Ireland, Bolingbroke returns to England, intent on recovering his rightful property and, with the support of his disgruntled peers, perhaps seizing the crown itself.
title: Richard II - Live at Shakespeare's Globe
